products.name: Uncharted: Legacy of Thieves Collection
products.description: Are You Ready To Seek Your Fortune? UNCHARTED: Legacy of Thieves Collection includes the two remastered, critically-acclaimed, globe-trotting single player adventures from UNCHARTED 4: A Thief’s End and UNCHARTED: The Lost Legacy

products.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
products.description: Winner of over 175 Game of the Year Awards and recipient of over 250 perfect scores, Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of honor and loyalty at the dawn of the modern age. Includes Red Dead Redemption 2: Story Mode and Red Dead Online.

products.name: God of War
products.description: His vengeance against the Gods of Olympus years behind him, Kratos now lives as a man in the realm of Norse Gods and monsters. It is in this harsh, unforgiving world that he must fight to survive… and teach his son to do the same.

products.name: Far Cry® 6
products.description: Dive into the gritty world of a modern-day guerrilla revolution to liberate a nation from its oppressive dictators.

products.name: FIFA 23
products.description: FIFA 23 brings The World’s Game to the pitch, with HyperMotion2 Technology, men’s and women’s FIFA World Cup™ coming during the season, women’s club teams, cross-play features*, and more.

products.name: Dying Light 2 Stay Human
products.description: The virus won and civilization has fallen back to the Dark Ages. The City, one of the last human settlements, is on the brink of collapse. Use your agility and combat skills to survive, and reshape the world. Your choices matter.

products.name: Grand Theft Auto V
products.description: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game played from either a third-person or first-person perspective. Players complete missions — linear scenarios — to progress through the story

products.name: Saints Row
products.description: Welcome to Santo Ileso, a vibrant fictional city in the American Southwest. In a world rife with crime, a group of young friends embark on their own criminal venture, as they rise to the top in their bid to become Self Made.

products.name: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered
products.description: In Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered, the worlds of Peter Parker and Spider-Man collide in an original, action-packed story. Play as an experienced Peter Parker, fighting big crime and iconic villains in Marvel’s New York. Web-swing through vibrant neighborhoods and defeat villains with epic takedowns.

products.name: theHunter: Call of the Wild™
products.description: Experience an atmospheric hunting game like no other in this realistic and visually breathtaking open world. Immerse yourself in the atmospheric single player campaign, or share the ultimate hunting experience with friends.

products.name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed
products.description: Hunting or haunting! The choice is yours in the upcoming asymmetrical Ghostbusters game from IllFonic, Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed. Play with up to four friends or solo on multiple platforms.

products.name: Overwatch
products.description: Overwatch is a colorful team-based action game starring a diverse cast of powerful heroes. Travel the world, build a team, and contest objectives in exhilarating 6v6 combat.

products.name: Minecraft
products.description: Minecraft is a sandbox game. There is a virtual land where users can create their own worlds and experiences, using building blocks, resources discovered on the site and their own creativity.

products.name: Among Us
products.description: Play with 4-15 players online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone!

products.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
products.description: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt is an action role-playing game with a third-person perspective. Players control Geralt of Rivia, a monster slayer known as a Witcher.

products.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
products.description: In Assassin's Creed Valhalla, become Eivor, a legendary Viking raider on a quest for glory. Explore a dynamic and beautiful open world set against the brutal backdrop of England's Dark Ages.

products.name: Cyberpunk 2077
products.description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification.

products.name: Far Cry 5
products.description: Hope County is the land of the free and the brave but also home to a fanatical doomsday cult known as Eden’s Gate. Stand up to cult leader and his siblings to liberate the besieged community.

products.name: Sims 4
products.description: Explore and customize every detail, from Sims to homes and much more. Choose how Sims look, act, and dress. Determine how they’ll live out each day.

products.name: Cooking Mama: Cookstar
products.description: This is a cooking simulation game in which players create and prepare dishes by completing cooking tasks (e.g., chopping, grating, fileting, frying)

products.name: DOOM 3
products.description: This is a first-person shooter in which players assume the role of a marine battling a demonic invasion at a Mars base. Players use big variety of guns to kill mutants and demonic creatures.

products.name: Epic Shef
products.description: This is an adventure game in which players assume the role of a young chef exploring the land, harvesting crops, and cooking dishes to battle in culinary duels.

products.name: Life is Strange: Before the storm
products.description: It is a game in which players assume the role of a high-school student investigating a family secret. Players are presented with various dialogue choices that change the course of the narrative.
products.alt: Life is Strange: Before the storm

products.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
products.description: The game's main story revolves around the player's character, the Dragonborn, on their quest to defeat Alduin the World-Eater, a dragon who is prophesied to destroy the world.

products.name: Apex Legends
products.description: Apex Legends is an online multiplayer battle royale game featuring squads of three players using pre-made characters with distinctive abilities, similar to those of hero shooters.

products.name: Mass Effect: Legendary Edition
products.description: The Mass Effect™ Legendary Edition includes single-player base content and over 40 DLC from Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2, and Mass Effect 3 games, including promo weapons and armors

products.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
products.description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is a first-person shooter video game developed by Infinity Ward for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Windows. It is a reboot of the original Modern Warfare trilogy.

products.name: Hitman
products.description: Hitman is a stealth video game in which players control a genetically enhanced assassin from a third-person perspective as he carries out assassinations of various targets across the globe.

products.name: Rust
products.description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. Everything wants you to die - the island’s wildlife and other inhabitants, the environment, other survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night.

products.name: Detroit: Become Human
products.description: Detroit: Become Human puts the destiny of both mankind and androids in your hands, taking you to a near future where machines have become more intelligent than humans. Every choice you make affects the outcome of the game, with one of the most intricately branching narratives ever created.
